scripts.build:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -pv --topological-dev --exclude getjust run build
scripts.build: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -Rpv --topological-dev --from $0 run build
scripts.dev:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -pv --topological-dev --exclude getjust run dev
scripts.dev: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -Rpvi --topological-dev --from $0 run dev
scripts.lint:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -pv --exclude getjust run lint
scripts.lint: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -Rpv --topological-dev --from $0 run lint
scripts.test:all: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -pv --exclude getjust run test
scripts.test: FORCE_COLOR=true yarn workspaces foreach -Rpv --topological-dev --from $0 run test
